0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 2500
Innate: Soraka gains  70% bonus movement speed while facing nearby allied  champions that are below 40% of their maximum health.
0.html: Innate: Soraka gains  70% bonus movement speed while facing nearby allied champions that are below 40% of their maximum health.
markedPassages: 70% bonus movement speed
champions

0.text: Active: Soraka calls down a star upon the target location that grants  sight of the area before landing after 0.25 − 1 (based on target range) seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Soraka calls down a star upon the target location that grants sight of the area before landing after 0.25 − 1 (based on target range) seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: 0.25 − 1 (based on target range)

markedPassages: sight
slowing

1.text: If this hits at least one enemy  champion, the star dust returns toward Soraka to grant her Rejuvenation for 2.5 seconds. While Soraka has Rejuvenation,  Astral Infusion will also grant the effects of Rejuvenation to the target ally for the same duration.
1.html: If this hits at least one enemy champion, the star dust returns toward Soraka to grant her Rejuvenation for 2.5 seconds. While Soraka has Rejuvenation, Astral Infusion will also grant the effects of Rejuvenation to the target ally for the same duration.
markedPassages: champion
Astral Infusion

2.text: Rejuvenation: The target  heals every 0.5 seconds and gains  bonus movement speed that decays over the duration.
2.html: Rejuvenation: The target heals every 0.5 seconds and gains  bonus movement speed that decays over the duration.
markedPassages: heals
bonus movement speed

0.text: COST: 10% MAXIMUM HEALTH + 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60 MANA
Active: Soraka  heals the target allied champion.
0.html: Active: Soraka heals the target allied champion.
markedPassages: heals

1.text: If cast while under  Rejuvenation, the health cost will be reduced by a percentage.
1.html: If cast while under Rejuvenation, the health cost will be reduced by a percentage.
markedPassages: Rejuvenation

2.text: Astral Infusion cannot be cast if Soraka is  below 5% of her maximum health.
2.html: Astral Infusion cannot be cast if Soraka is  below 5% of her maximum health.
markedPassages: below 5% of her maximum health
below 5% of her maximum health

0.text: Active: Soraka creates a celestial zone at the target location that deals magic damage to enemy champions within upon casting. The zone then persists for 1.5 seconds and  siliences enemies within.
0.html: Active: Soraka creates a celestial zone at the target location that deals magic damage to enemy champions within upon casting. The zone then persists for 1.5 seconds and siliences enemies within.
markedPassages: siliences

1.text: Afterwards, the zone erupts to deal the same magic damage to enemy champions within and  root them for a duration.
1.html: Afterwards, the zone erupts to deal the same magic damage to enemy champions within and root them for a duration.
markedPassages: root

Afterwards, the zone erupts to deal the same magic damage to enemy champions within and  root them for a duration.
